page.description: An alias for the current object.

argument.name: Method
argument.description: The name of a method of the current object.

argument.name: Property
argument.description: The name of a property of the current object.

page.discussion: THIS is an alias for the current object. It is useful when the name of the object is not known. Do not confuse the THIS alias with the THIS property of an object, which is used to return the object's pointer address.
